The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 August is 267,324 (474.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 August, there were 5,096 new confirmed cases (9.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 July, there were 4,783 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (313 extra cases).
